definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: dig, row (NH id., bore (through), so Aram. [[חֲתַר]] Targum (rare))—

dig into houses, c. acc. [[בָּתִּים]] Job 24:16 (of burglary); sq. [[בְּ]] into or through a wall Ez Eze 8:8, Eze 8:8 (Co del. on intern. grounds), Eze 12:5, Eze 12:7, Eze 12:12; metaph. sq. [[בשׁאול]] Am 9:2 dig into She’ôl, i.e. as a refuge.
row (as digging into the water) Jon 1:13.
